properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 11 at 2:46PM MST until January 12 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Missoula MT
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the Winter Storm Warning, heavy snow expected. Total
snow accumulations of 6 to 11 inches mainly west of Saint Regis
and Thompson Falls, including Lookout Pass, and 3 to 5 inches
elsewhere. For the Winter Weather Advisory, snow. Additional
snow accumulations of around 2 inches and higher amounts of 3 to
5 inches over Lookout Pass.

* WHERE...Evaro Hill, Highway 200 Thompson Falls to Plains,
Highway 200 Trout Creek to Heron, and I-90 Lookout Pass to
Haugan.

* WHEN...For the Winter Storm Warning, from noon Sunday to 11 AM
MST Monday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 5 AM MST
Sunday.

* IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible Sunday
afternoon through Sunday night. Patchy blowing snow could
significantly reduce visibility.
properties.instruction:
If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in
your vehicle in case of an emergency.

Slow down and use caution while traveling.

The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can
be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST SUNDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON SUNDAY TO 11 AM MST MONDAY
